term: ENTSO for Electricity operational planning data environment
original_definition: 'ENTSO for Electricity operational planning data environment' means the set of application programs and equipment developed in order to allow the storage, exchange and management of the data used for operational planning processes between TSOs;
generated_definition: 'ENTSO for Electricity operational planning data environment' means a centralized repository for storing and sharing electricity grid models and related information across different time-frames, established by the european network of transmission system operators for electricity (entso for electricity).
